name: Unity Project 11 - Dungeon Boss Fight
description:
PC:

Use the WASD keys / Arrow keys to Move.

Use the Mouse to Look Around.

Press SPACE to Jump.

Hold SHIFT to Run, but watch your stamina!

Left-Click to Sheath Weapon / Attack.

Right-Click to Defend.

Middle-Click to Unsheath Weapon.

Wield your mighty weapon and press on!

Mobile:

Use the Left Joystick to Move.

Use the RIGHT SIDE of the screen to Look Around.

Press the JUMP icon to Jump.

Press the RUN icon to Start Running, press again to Stop Running, but watch your stamina!

Press the WEAPON icon to Sheath Weapon / Attack.

Press the SHIELD icon to Defend.

Press the X icon to Unsheath Weapon.

Muster your courage and move on!

P.S. So UNSHEATH means to READY a weapon, and SHEATH means to UNREADY a weapon......yeah, not good.
